title: List of satirists and satires
table_of_contents: 7 Notable satires in contemporary popular culture

paragraphs.text:
This is an incomplete list of writers, cartoonists and others known for involvement in satire – humorous social criticism. They are grouped by era and listed by year of birth. Included is a list of modern satires.

Under Contemporary, 1930-1960

P.J. O'Rourke
Joe Queenan
In alphabetical order (many birth dates not known):

paragraphs.title: Notable satires in contemporary popular culture
paragraphs.text: In modern culture, much satire is often the work of several individuals collectively, as in magazines and television. Hence the following list.
